analysis: The documents all concern the revocation of previous executive orders that had withdrawn public lands, followed by the opening of those lands for entry under homestead or desert land laws, primarily for ex-service men for a limited period (91 days) before being opened to the general public. The documents frequently cite Public Resolution 85 or Public Resolution No. 29, offering preferential access to land for veterans.
title: Land Reopenings for Veterans After Resurvey
